channel.title: [MSCP] Fix da search button!
channel.description: Well, Moparisthebest seems to have fixed the search button here on MITB, but what about moparisthebest.com? I'm still stuck using the google-search thingy, and it's really bad, since it can't find recently created topics (and in RS2 Server Discussion/Help, that's like 10 pages of "hulp wit servir pl0x i mek u admen", and one actually useful topic, which I can't find. So yah, fix the search button on MSCP, please?

item.title: [MSCP] Fix da search button!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:15, topic:134146”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=185525.msg1683269#msg1683269 date=1187420739]

how the fhk can you abuse a search button lel.

Each search performs a mysql query, along with multiple words searching multiple boards, even by multiple authors along with the dedi. being stretched as it is, it doesn’t take long for SMF to be rendered connectionless to the mysql database.

Well that makes sense (no im not being sarcastic)
is ‘your mysql’ an oxymoron
[/quote]

It’s the equivalent of a DOS attack on the MySQL database.[/quote]

Thanks for the tip.
I new attack muahahha

Read full topic

item.title: [MSCP] Fix da search button!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:11, topic:134146”]He removed it before he updated his ram because it used up to much ram.

I remember mopar saying “people abused to search button”, how the fhk can you abuse a search button lel.[/quote]

Type in ‘e’ as the search term, select “Search all boards”, click OK. Repeat 100x.

Read full topic
